deviation.Pending_Tasks:
CEO Reporting Templates 
-Both CEO IDs should have access to reporting templates, as discussed multiple times. 
-Please ensure these views are set up accordingly in their respective IDs.

Regional Head’s + Sales Manager’s Access 
-The funnel visualization (pictorial depiction) is currently missing – needs to be enabled.

Migrated Leads Issues
-Migrated leads are incorrectly appearing as New Leads under respective territories.
-All migrated data should be moved to a separate bucket: "LEAD NURTURING" (bucket - as mentioned in Lead Activities Pre & Post Qualification sheet).
-These migrated leads should reflect their last known status (not appear as new).
-Data mapping of migrated leads needs to be thoroughly verified.
-Last hardstop of complete migration has been rescheduled to be May 15, 2025. Inclusive of all timelines, activities, lead journey history, freshworks lead creation date, all notes .

Pre-Sales Testing Results
-Out of 20 test leads created by the Pre-Sales team, only 4 were correctly auto-assigned based on territory.
-Credentech Team needs to review logic behind auto-assignment & the reason for other leads not getting auto-assigned.
-New Leads created manually are not getting assigned and stay under the creator’s ID.
-When a lead is marked as call not picked and converts to ‘Unanswered Call’ and then revisited to be converted into an SQL (as we will do in real case scenario), the system does not allow:
Status change or
Activity marking
-This lead remains ‘Unanswered Call’ which should not be the case as we will keep revisiting our ‘Unanswered Calls’ until client has not answered 5 times or it converts to a SQL.
-Same is the case with ‘Interested Later’ leads, we will revisit these leads after speaking to the client at a later date advised by him/her.

Sales-Related Observations
-Under Appointment status, sub-status Meeting Not Fixed still not visible – please add.
-Lead for Sushmita's territory wrongly getting auto-assigned to user Mahesh – mapping needs correction.
-All sub-status entries should be mandatory to avoid incomplete data capture.
-Post Closed Won Status: all these elements are currently missing and need to be incorporated: Franchise Fee update, Centre launch date, Calendar/Next Plan input etc

Reporting Templates (Attached) 
Geetika: Pre-Sales Template configuration – Pending 
Naitalee: Marketing Template configuration – Pending

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Limited Transaction Options When ""Call Not Picked"" Status is Selected
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback: When the Status "Call not picked" is selected, only two options are showing in transactions: (1) SQL (2) 5 times call not picked. However, here all options should show up.

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Request to Unlock Status Change After Selecting ""Financial Not Viable"" in Pre-Sales Process
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback,In the Pre-Sales stage, once we mark an opportunity as "Financial Not Viable," the system currently locks the status and does not allow further changes. However, in practice, clients sometimes reconsider their decision after conducting further market research and may reach out to re-engage with the opportunity. PRE-SALES TEAM SHOULD HAVE ALL STATUS UNLOCKED to be able to change them To accommodate such cases, we request that the system allow status updates even after selecting "Financial Not Viable." This flexibility will help us efficiently manage revived opportunities and avoid creating duplicate entries.

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Feedback on Lead Nurturing Visibility for Unanswered Calls in Pre-Sales
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback, Currently, when a lead is marked as "Call Not Picked" five times, it does not appear in the Lead Nurturing section. As a result, these leads are not visible for further follow-up or re-engagement. However, these leads should ideally move to a common "Lead Nurturing" bucket so that they can be systematically revisited and rechurned at a later stage. This will help ensure that no potential opportunity is permanently lost due to initial non-responsiveness.
deviation.Scope_Status: Not in scope - INCORRECT. The 'Lead Activity Sheet - Pre & Post Qualification' has this mentioned clearly.

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Request to Unlock Status Change After Selecting ""Interested later"" in Pre-Sales Process
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback, When the Status "Interested later" there is no option to change the status if nedeed. (sometimes client call us back if there's a change in their decision ) so PRE-SALES TEAM SHOULD HAVE ALL STATUS UNLOCKED to be able to change them
deviation.Dev_Comments: By default, Zoho CRM Blueprints can have a maximum of 10 common transitions. As already this limit has exceeded with other transitions , this could not be possible.

deviation.Pending: Access Issue – Unable to View Salesperson Bucket (Geetika Sethi)
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback, For Geetika Sethi, there seems to be an issue with admin or role-based access, as she is currently unable to view the Sales Users in the system. We need clarity on which specific access or permissions are required for her role to be able to view all users as an admin.
deviation.Dev_Comments: This is already there, Geetika can access the entire org + presales team.

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Lead Assignment Issue Based on Pincode in Pre-Sales
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback, When we create a lead and enter the pincode, the lead is not being assigned to the appropriate lead owner as per the expected territory or mapping rules. This causes delays in follow-up and misrouting of leads.

deviation.Pending_Tasks: Lead Mapping Issue When City Is Not Mentioned (State Divided Between Owners)
deviation.Reason_Reference: Pre-sales Feedback, In cases where only the state is mentioned (and the city is left blank), and that state is split between two Pre-Sales/Sales owners, it’s unclear how the system assigns the lead. This ambiguity can result in misrouting or leads not being picked up promptly.
deviation.Dev_Comments: We have added only the data we received. There is no rule defined for assigning users to any specific state. If any additional configuration is required, please provide the necessary details to set up the rule.
